1078120.name: Heaven's Vault Demo
1078120.description:
An archaeologist uncovers a lost history in an ancient space Nebula. Award-winning narrative adventure game with hieroglyphic language puzzles, from the creators of 80 DAYS.

Aliya Elasra is an archaeologist, and with her sidekick Six, she is intent on uncovering the forgotten past of the Nebula where they live - a place of buried robots, fallen Empires, and long-lost Gods. Sail the rivers of space - explore ancient sites - and translate inscriptions in an entire symbolic language, in a massive interconnected puzzle that stretches across the entire game.

"One of the most well-realized video game worlds ever, with your curiosity and personality molding your story through the Nebula" - USGamer

"Heaven’s Vault is both ambitious and beautiful. It conjures a world rich with life" - Game Informer

"Heaven's Vault is one of the most enthralling narrative-driven adventure games I've played" - Wired

This demo will allow you to explore one of several sites in the game, and try your hand at translations.
1078120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
